channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rapper A$AP Rocky sold his $4 million L.A. mansion in off-market deal months before Rihanna gave birth
item.description: Days before A$AP Rocky’s longtime partner Rihanna debuted her baby bump on the red carpet in May, the rapper quietly sold his L.A. home.

item.title: AMD gets upgrade after 24% surge. ‘We rarely do this,’ says chagrinned analyst
item.description: It’s likely the first of many — analysts at Jefferies upgraded Advanced Micro Devices to a buy, after the chipmaker’s stock surged on a pact with Chat...

item.title: The U.S. just took a stake in another resources company — and the stock is tripling
item.description: Trilogy Metals shares tripled in premarket trade on Tuesday as the U.S. government took a 10% stake in a company exploring in Alaska for copper and ot...

item.title: NBA’s Michael Porter Jr. lists Denver high-rise home for $5.25 million
item.description: NBA star Michael Porter Jr. is getting set to sever his ties to Denver by listing his opulent apartment for $5.25 million—3 months after he was traded...

item.title: Here’s how much shorter your life is if you’re poor in America
item.description: Older adults with the fewest financial resources die much earlier than those with more wealth.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
